name: The last hope (itch) (waltergk, damian1ilin)
description:
This is a game made in 72hs for LUDUM DARE 46

Travel diary: I don’t know how many time passed since I went on sleep mode, or either how much distance the ship travelled. I hope that the other agents reached somewhere safe. All I know is that the WUAA system (wake up at arrival) initiated, what means that I reached a potential new home for the human race. I must scan the zone and protect the life plant from any hazards. This plant is capable of producing anything I need to recover the human race, from ammo, to full humans clones.

Vital info:     

     Movement: W,A,S,D
     Shoot: click
     Reload gun: R
     Run: Lshift

First objective: survive as long as possible.

CREDITS:

Art: @damian1ilin

Programing & audio: @WalterGK

Music by: Nicolas Larroca && Rodrigo Zacañino

For better framerate Download the winsows version!
